question:
Which of the following statements are correct?
1. Carbon, hydrogen, oxygen, nitrogen and phosphorus as elements and compounds that make up 97% of the mass of our bodies.
2. These are more than 95% of the mass of all living organisms.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Carbon, hydrogen, oxygen, nitrogen and phosphorus as elements and compounds that make up 97% of the mass of our bodies. These are more than 95% of the mass of all living organisms.
